sentence: Figure 1 illustrates the relationship between the size of the external validation data set n0 and estimated standard error and 95% CI coverage under each approach.

Figure 2 displays the estimated cumulative incidence of mortality and loss to care over time using the standard approach  and the proposed approach  and pointwise 95% confidence limits calculated at each event time.
